title: Bold font with lines on the edges
author: tyra

comments.content: **[Boris Black Bloxx Dirty](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725021013/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=BorisBlackBloxxDirty%20-%20Regular&fid=574c66275dccd663683c2bfb3c34d789&fsize=60&text=Dont&fit=1)** free font by Manfred Klein [2003]
You are a genius! Thank you so much!!
spoke too soon. It shows a different font on Dafont. Its not the same

There are 2 fonts on Dafont under the name "Boris Black Bloxx":  
 [http://www.dafont.com/boris-black-bloxx.font?text=Dont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725021013/http:/www.dafont.com/boris-black-bloxx.font?text=Dont "http://www.dafont.com/boris-black-bloxx.font?text=Dont")

You need the 2nd one, which is named "Boris Black Bloxx **Dirty**"
